event-desc: Numbers of workshops from the industry experts, working professionals, experienced developers, CEOs, and more... This is an ocean of knowledge and mindful personalities. Grab the golden opportunity to learn from these great minds.

We will be hosting the opening ceremony of the hackathon  virtually on Youtube. Links for the opening ceremony will be shared via emails as well as on our Discord. The opening ceremony will involve an overview of the event and a warm welcome to all participants.
Expand your mind, think of problems and start hacking to let your solutions change the world.
